process.title: Improved Process Execution
points: Replaces error-prone manual spreadsheet work with a standardized, auditable workflow.
Reduces risk of human error in calculations and data aggregation.
Frees up analyst time to focus on high-value strategic insights instead of data entry.

definitions.title: Shared Definitions, Unified View
points: Centralizes data roll-up logic into a single, shared rules engine.
Creates a single source of truth, eliminating departmental data silos.
Ensures all stakeholders operate with the same assumptions for clearer communication.

insights.title: Organizational-Wide Insights
points: Enables high-level analysis across the entire organization with consistent data.
Provides intuitive visualizations to quickly identify trends and compare performance.
Empowers leadership to make faster, data-driven decisions with confidence.
